Sample.Name: CreateSpreadsheetPage
Sample.Title: Create Spreadsheet
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports to create an Excel document without any dependency of Microsoft Excel in few lines of code.

Sample.Name: ChartsPage
Sample.Title: Charts
Sample.Description: Create and manipulate all types of Excel charts with elements like chart title, legend, axis title, data labels, line styles, etc.

Sample.Name: FormulasPage
Sample.Title: Formulas
Sample.Description: XlsIO has support to read, write and calculate formulas. The built-in calculation engine can quickly evaluate formula cell values at runtime.

Sample.Name: ImportCLRObjectsPage
Sample.Title: CLR Objects
Sample.Description: CLR objects usually holds a set of instance variables or properties, also known as attributes. XlsIO allows to import data directly from CLR objects.

Sample.Name: DataTablePage
Sample.Title: DataTable
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports import/export DataTables from/to Excel worksheets.

Sample.Name: ImportXMLPage
Sample.Title: Import XML Data
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports single line of code to import XML data into an Excel worksheet.

Sample.Name: FiltersPage
Sample.Title: Filters
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports data filtering based on text, date and custom options.

Sample.Name: FindAndReplacePage
Sample.Title: Find and Replace
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports to find the range of a value in the worksheet and replace it with a new value.

Sample.Name: WorksheetToHTMLPage
Sample.Title: Worksheet To HTML
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports conversion of worksheets to HTML files.
